name: pnp-list-formatting-event-itinerary-header
title: Event Itinerary Header
shortDescription: This sample shows a customized header for the item form used in the "Event itinerary" list template.
longDescription: This sample shows a customized header for the item form used in the "Event itinerary" list template.

metadata.value: Number, Date, toLocaleTimeString, getDate, getMonth, getYear

ms-bgColor-themePrimary, ms-bgColor-white, ms-borderColor-themePrimary, ms-fontColor-themePrimary, ms-fontColor-white, ms-fontWeight-bold, ms-fontSize-42, ms-fontSize-28, ms-fontSize-24, ms-fontSize-16, ms-fontSize-14

references.name: Configure the list form
references.description: You can configure the list form in a list or library with a custom header, footer and the form body with one or more sections with fields in each of those sections.

references.name: Show or hide columns in a list or library form
references.description: You can show or hide columns in a list or library form as an alternative to deleting them. When you hide a column, it doesn't affect the column or the data in the column, as it would if you delete it.
